Trigger.Name: Off Debuff
Trigger.RegularExpression: You recovers from the effect of Final Decree Nisi

Trigger.Name: Debuff Alpha
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Decree Nisi α.

Trigger.Name: Debuff Beta
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Decree Nisi β.

Trigger.Name: Debuff Delta
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Decree Nisi δ.

Trigger.Name: Debuff Gamma
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Decree Nisi γ.

Trigger.Name: Counter
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Decree Nisi

Trigger.Name: Send Alpha
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi α.

Trigger.Name: Get Alpha
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi a.

Trigger.Name: Debuff Final Off
Trigger.RegularExpression: You recovers from the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi

Trigger.Name: Debuff Final Alpha
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi α.

Trigger.Name: Debuff Final Beta
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi ß.

Trigger.Name: Debuff Final Delta
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi δ.

Trigger.Name: Debuff Final Gamma
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi γ.

Trigger.Name: Get Beta
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi β.

Trigger.Name: Send Beta
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi β.

Trigger.Name: Get Gamma
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi γ.

Trigger.Name: Send Gamma
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi γ.

Trigger.Name: Get Delta
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi δ.

Trigger.Name: Send Delta
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi δ.

Trigger.Name: Initiate
Trigger.RegularExpression: Brute Justice readies Judgment Nisi

Trigger.Name: Set Delta
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Decree Nisi δ.

Trigger.Name: Set Alpha
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Decree Nisi α.

Trigger.Name: Set Beta
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Decree Nisi β.

Trigger.Name: Set Gamma
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Decree Nisi γ.
